description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided with tool,s guidance and resources for effective communication and advocay on child rights issues..

title.narrative: Colombia United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Programmes in Colombia (Communication for Development)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2015 Colombia: Evaluación de la Estrategia de Comunicación para el Cambio Social La Muralla Soy Yo
2019 Colombia: Evaluación de resultados de las acciones de inclusión de familias con niñas niños y adolescentes con discapacidad en Familias en Acción (2012-2018)
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided with tool,s guidance and resources for effective communication and advocay on child rights issues..

description.narrative: UNICEF Colombia increased Voice, Reach and Engagement. In all messages UNICEF Colombia communicated actions for children to advocate and reaffirm that all children have equal rights to fulfil their potential. The 2019 communications results reinforced that UNICEF identifies communication and advocacy as essential for achieving programmatic goals, fundraising and partnerships. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/02/2020

title.narrative: UNICEF's Colombia Communication and Public Advocacy Strategy encompasses three central objectives to be reached by the end of 2019: 1. REACH: Contribute from the CO to reach globally 1 billion people listening to UNICEF's positive voice.

baseline.value: 500 million positive views in Colombia through traditional and digital media.

target.value: 2019:6.25% Increase in 6.25% based on a minumin of 475 million positive views in traditional and digital media that is the baseline from 2018

title.narrative: ENGAGEMENT: UNICEF CO is committed to contribute to reach at least one billion and engage 50 million people by 2017. This is not limited to online and media channels but should include the number of people we reach through our offline initiatives. C4D initiatives and other offline approaches are helping to drive greater citizen and youth engagement, where people have the opportunity to take actions for children on behalf of UNICEF.

baseline.value: Number of returning users to web-site.

target.value: 2019:Increase at least 8% of return visitors to website arriving to 246233 returning visitors by 2019

title.narrative: VOICE: Contribute from the CO to the global objective: To be the world's most credible, trusted voice to drive change for children, by the engagement of people.

baseline.value: Obtain to 2019 at least 78% of UNICEF CO coverage that is favourable or higher in top-tier media.

target.value: 2019:Increase of minimum 2 percentage points over 76% UNICEF CO coverage that is favourable or higher in top-tier media
